title: 20 MIN Beginner WALK & LIGHT JOG Treadmill Workout
description:
Let's warm up those treadmills and join Coach Rachael for a Beginner Walk and Light Jog Workout. This is the perfect workout for those walkers or runners who don't want to jump into a full running workout quite yet. We will take it slow, but still sweaty, in this tread routine!

22:00 minutes of run and recovery intervals

All speeds and inclines are suggestions. Please stay safe and within your comfort zone!

Join our community of runners: http://www.ibxrunning.com
Merch: https://www.ibxrunning.com/store
IBX Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/ibxrunning/
Veronica's Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bodibyroni/
Rachael's Instragram: https://www.instagram.com/bedopefitness/

00:00 - Intro
00:43 - Warm Up
03:43 - Workout!
20:12 - Cool Down

Workout Structure:
Warmup: 3 minutes 
Part 1 - 5 Segments
      HILL WALK: 90 Seconds - 3.1 - 4.2 mph - 3.0 Incline
      Increase speed by 0.1 each segment
Part 2 - Repeat 4 times
      Jog: 90 Seconds - 4.0 - 6.0 mph
      Recover: 30 seconds - 3.0 - 4.0 mph
Cooldown at the end!

Songs Used:
1. Adore U - waykap
2. Five Thirty AM - Elijah N
3. I'm Crazy for Love - Craig Reever
4. Late Nights - Daxten
5. No Fui el Primero - Lu-Ni
6. Say We're Sorry (Hallman Remix) - Loving Caliber
7. Still in Love with You - Basixx

What did you enjoy about this workout? What suggestions do you have? We would love to hear from you below 👇

SUBSCRIBE to our Channel for more workouts!► https://www.youtube.com/c/IBXRunning/featured

channelDescription:
We are a community that wants to improve ourselves through running. Whether that improvement comes in the form of bettering our health, becoming more disciplined, creating a more positive attitude, or simply decreasing our mile times, the IBX Running community is welcoming and constructive. IBX Running knows that runners come in all shapes, sizes, and skill levels, and endeavors to be a place where members of our community can feel comfortable to strive to be better than they were last week, last month, and last year.

comments: Where have you been all my life?! The humour, inspiration, motivation then more humour!
i have  done this video everyday for 4 weeks gradually increasing my speeds , i found it very good
I love your walking videos!  Followed along to a 20 and a 40 minute walking video this AM at the gym!  Planning to do this one next time!
i have probably done this video 6 times already this month.. it’s my fav as a beginner to amplify the intensity each time and see my growth 😍😆
I’ve been working out consistently for about 3 weeks now. I followed this tutorial and was up to 5.0 on my hill and 6.0 on the mph. This was an awesome workout! Thank you @IBX Running 🏃‍♀️
